welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Vero Beach, known for its beautiful beaches, art galleries, and quaint downtown area. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Lucie County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Lucie County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
